DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Performed Observation Outcome Concern Or Reason Major Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether the adverse event or reaction term is a major concern or reason for reporting the adverse event.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Event Performed Observation Outcome Concern Or Reason Major Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A matter of interest or importance.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:Greater or bigger in amount, extent, or size.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: A matter of interest or importance.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:Greater or bigger in amount, extent, or size.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: A matter of interest or importance.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
Greater or bigger in amount, extent, or size.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2/19/13 Added AIM Foundation Model CSI reference. jc
